sub_title: Data Analyst | Artificial Intelligence & Data at Deloitte
summary:
I am a highly motivated, versatile, results-oriented Engineer and aspiring Data Analytics Specialist with a strong academic background in Petroleum Engineering.  To stay relevant in a world constantly changing and evolving, I have found my passion that has helped me recognize that Data and Technology are the “new oil” in today’s business world and in the foreseeable future to come. 

I have developed additional skillsets in managing master data sets, developing reports, troubleshooting data issues, information retrieval, master data management, and analytics, data quality, and data stewardship, using several analytical tools ranging from SQL, Tableau, Power BI, and Python to generate business insights that aid informed and strategic decision-making. I am skilled in communicating and presenting transformed data in the most relatable manner, with the ability to operate efficiently and comfortably across different business levels. Known for delivering valuable blends of expertise in leading teamwork while further maturing data management processes and data literacy. I am well-versed in coordinating with other organizational bodies to perform specialized work and cross-collaboration to reach target goals and objectives.

I consider myself to be an optimist, goal-oriented professional, possessing the right mindset and attitude. I have a positive approach toward tasks, situations, and people. A leader and team player capable of functioning effectively as part of a high-performing team and business environment.

I enjoy networking, so connect with me today, or reach out at ✉ vk.chikeluba@gmail.com

certifications.name: Introduction to Data Science in Python
Data Analytics: Dashboards vs. Data Stories

Picking the Right Chart for Your Data
Power BI Data Modelling with DAX

projects.title: SQL PROJECT: What and Where are the World's Oldest Businesses
projects.description:
An important part of a business is planning for the future and ensuring that the business survives changing market conditions. Some businesses do this remarkably well and last for hundreds of years. In this project, I explored data from BusinessFinancing.co.uk on the world's oldest businesses to determine when they were founded, and which industries they belong to.

Like many business problems, the data is contained in several different datasets. In order to understand the world's oldest businesses, there was a need to use joining techniques to merge our data. From there, we can use manipulation tools such as grouping and filtering to answer questions about these historic businesses.

contributors.headline: Data Analyst | Artificial Intelligence & Data at Deloitte

projects.title: SQL Project: Analyze International Debt Statistics
projects.description:
Analysing International debt statistics using international debt data collected by The World Bank. The dataset contained information about the amount of debt (in USD) owed by developing countries across several categories. 

This project was structured to provide insight on the total amount of debt owed by several countries, identify the country with the highest debt amount, estimate the average amount of debt owed by countries across different debt indicators.

contributors.headline: Data Analyst | Artificial Intelligence & Data at Deloitte

projects.title: Financial Report Sample
projects.description:
This project represents an executive summary of the following metrics:
* Which month and year had the most profit?
* Where is the company seeing the most success (by country)?
* Which product and segment should the company continue to invest in?

profile_positions.description:

❑ Earned necessary experience in SQL joins and subqueries and application of python – slicing & manipulating data.
❑ Provided a keen eye on performing cost-benefit evaluation on proposed business projects using a weighted decision matrix.

profile_positions.description:

Developed a strategic approach to market my services, and promote productivity and effectiveness that are extremely valuable to my clients. Performed research on behalf of my clients, collected and analyzed information, and used the data to problem solve and improve overall decision-making in my client’s businesses.
